properties.Polution Source: Rupsha ghat region is comparatively low lying area. Pollutants come from non-point sources, such as- agricultural land, shrimp, or fish farms etc. Many industries are found at this location.

properties.Name: Shashan Ghat
properties.Location: , Ward No-16 (part), Khalishpur, Khulna, Khulna
properties.Use of Water: Water used mainly for irrigation as well as domestic purposes.
properties.Polution Source: Moyuri river caries fresh water from surrounding areas and supplies to Rupsa. Land on both sides of the Moyuri river is used for agriculture and the river carries agricultural pollutant loaded runoff.

properties.Name: Buro Moulavir Darga
properties.Location: Alutala, Jalma, Batiaghata, Khulna, Khulna
properties.Use of Water: Water used mainly for irrigation as well as domestic purposes.
properties.Polution Source: Moyuri river caries fresh water from surrounding areas and supplies to Rupsa. Land on both sides of the Moyuri river is used for agriculture and the river carries agricultural pollutants loaded runoff.

properties.Name: Dosh Gate
properties.Location: Tentultala, Jalma, Batiaghata, Khulna, Khulna
properties.Use of Water: Open water fishing, domestic use and irrigation with river water are found at this section of Moyuri River.
properties.Polution Source: Agricultural runoff, sewerage effluents and industrial pollutants of whole Khulna City are responsible of poor water quality at this location.

properties.Name: Kazibacha-Batiaghata Bypass
properties.Location: Hatbaria, Batiaghata, Batiaghata, Khulna, Khulna
properties.Use of Water: People make open water fishing, use water for shrimp farming as well as for brick fields.
properties.Polution Source: Surface run off from agriculture field and fish feed waste from Shrimp farms. Sediment pollution is also happens here from the brick fields.

properties.Name: Rampal Power Plant
properties.Location: Bidyarbon, Burirdanga, Mongla, Bagerhat, Khulna
properties.Use of Water: People make open water fishing, use water for shrimp farming as well as for irrigation purposes.
properties.Polution Source: Surface run off from agriculture field and fish feed waste from Shrimp farms contributes to water pollution. The widely discussed Rampal Coal Fired Power Plant is located at this point.

properties.Name: Banishanta
properties.Location: Banishanta, Banishanta, Dacope, Khulna, Khulna
properties.Use of Water: Water used for industrial as well as domestic purposes. The large water vessel come from Chittagong port and discharge cargo at Mongal port at this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Water pollution happens from industrial effluents, Port sweage, run off from settelment areas and transportation discharge (lub oil and grease, black oil).

properties.Name: Gab Khan Lunch Terminal
properties.Location: Charkati, Gabkhan Dhansiri, Jhalokati Sadar, Jhalokati, Barisal
properties.Use of Water: Open waer fishing, irrigation as well as domestic use of river water found at this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Water pollution happens from industrial effluents, run off from settelment areas and transportation discharge (lub oil and grease, black oil).

properties.Name: Daprodopia Khea Ghat
properties.Location: Paschim Char Dapdapia, Dapdapia, Nalchity, Jhalokati, Barisal
properties.Use of Water: Open waer fishing, irrigation as well as domestic use of river water found at this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Water pollution happens from industrial effluents, run off from settelment areas and transportation discharge (lub oil and grease, black oil).

properties.Name: Kauar Char Ferry Ghat
properties.Location: Kaua Char, Char Kowa, Barisal Sadar (kotwali), Barisal, Barisal
properties.Use of Water: Natural fishing ground, agricultural use and water way transportation are the key three aspect of water use in this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Runoff from agricultural field and residues of water transports cause water pollution.

properties.Name: Veduriya Ferry Ghat
properties.Location: Char Bhedaria, Bhedaria, Bhola Sadar, Bhola, Barisal
properties.Use of Water: Natural fishing ground, agricultural use and water way transportation key three aspect of water use in this locaiton.
properties.Polution Source: Runoff from agricultural field and residues of water transports cause water pollution. Oil spill pollution also happens here from waer way vehicles.

properties.Name: CUFL
properties.Location: Ragadia, Bairag, Karnafuli, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: Water is used basically in different industries.
properties.Polution Source: Large industries concentrate such as Di-Ammonium Phosphate Fertilizer, CUFL and Karnaphuli Fertilizer Company Ltd located at this point. River water uses in the fertilizer factory. Pollutant comes to the river from the factory.

properties.Name: TSP Location
properties.Location: , Ward No-40, Patenga, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: Water is used basically in different industries.
properties.Polution Source: TSP point is located near Patenga road. Large industries concentrate at this location. Bangladesh Metrological Department set their monitoring station at this location. Pollutants are coming from point sources.

properties.Name: TSP Location
properties.Location: , Ward No-41, Patenga, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: Water is used basically in different industries.
properties.Polution Source: TSP point is located near Patenga road. Large industries concentrate at this location. Bangladesh Metrological Department set their monitoring station at this location. Pollutants are coming from point sources.

properties.Name: Shikalbaha Power Station (Chaktai)
properties.Location: Sikalbaha, Sikalbaha, Karnafuli, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: Water is used basically in different industries.
properties.Polution Source: The distributaries Murari Khal carrier's water from Karnaphuli to the horizon of agricultural land in Shikalbaha. Few red category industries such as Shikalbaha Power Station and Western Marine Shipyard are situated at this location.

properties.Name: Kalurghat Bridge
properties.Location: , Ward No-05, Chandgaon, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: This location is natural breeding ground for fisheries. Water is also used for irrigaion purposes.
properties.Polution Source: The river Halda confluents at this location and both the rivers have diurnal effects. Halda river carries agricultural pollutants and contributes to Karnaphuli mainstream.

properties.Name: Mariam Nagar
properties.Location: Katakhali, Mariamnagar, Rangunia, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: This location is natural breeding ground for fisheries. Water is also used for irrigaion purposes.
properties.Polution Source: The area is highly concentrated with agricultural practices. Pollutions are coming from non-point sources such as pesticide & chemical fertilizer used in agriculture field. Some pollutant comes from brick field as sediments.

properties.Name: KMP
properties.Location: Narangiri, Raikhali, Kaptai, Rangamati, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: People make use of river water for industrial purpose, fisheries, and irrigation purposes.
properties.Polution Source: A large area used for tea gardening near this location. The Karnaphuli Paper Mills is located here. A distributaries carries polluted water to nearby large agricultural lands. These are the main pollution sources.

properties.Name: Maduna Ghat
properties.Location: Dakshin Madrasha, Dakshin Madarsha, Hathazari, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: Supply of drinking water, agricultural practices and fish culture are major concern of water use.
properties.Polution Source: Maduna Water Treatment Plant is constructed near the strategic location for the supply of drinking water in Chittagong city. Pollutants are coming from non-point sources, such as brick field and agricultural land.

properties.Name: Gharduara Sluice Gate
properties.Location: Garduara, Garduara, Hathazari, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: This is the most important natural fish breeding ground. River water is also used for irrigation purposes.
properties.Polution Source: Pollutants are coming from non-point sources, such as brick field and agricultural land.

properties.Name: Halda Bridge
properties.Location: Gahira, Gahira, Raozan, Chittagong, Chittagong
properties.Use of Water: This is the most important natural fish breeding ground. River water is also used for irrigation purposes.
properties.Polution Source: Halda Bridge area is very important location for the supply of drinking water, agricultural practices and fish culture. Pollutants are coming from non-point sources, such as brick field and agricultural land.
